channel.title: Softlayer_container_virtual_dedicatedhost_pci_device_allocationstatus on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_virtual_dedicatedhost_pci_device_allocationstatus on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_Pci_Device_AllocationStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_Pci_Device_AllocationStatus Datatype Description This data type represents PCI device allocation properties of a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost]]. Local deviceCount The number of PCI devices on the host. Type: integer devicesAllocated The number of PCI devices currently allocated to guests. Type: integer devicesAvailable The number of PCI devices available for allocation. Type: integer hardwareComponentModelGenericId The generic component model ID of the PCI device.
